asexual.description: For those who identify as Asexual/Ace.

avians.description: For those whose sonas are Avians (basically birds).

bisexual.description: For those who identify as Bisexual.

canines.description: For those whose sonas are Canines.

felines.description: For those whose sonas are Felines.

females.description: For those who identify as Female.

non-furs.description: For those who don't identify as a furry, but support furries.

gay.description: For those who identify as Gay.

hybrids.description: For those whose sonas are a Hybrid of two species.

lesbian.description: For those who identify as Lesbian.

male.description: For those who identify as Male.

pansexual.description: For those who identify as Pansexual.

straight.description: For those who identify as Straight.

transgender.description: For those who identify as Transgender.

vulpines.description: For those whose sonas are Vulpines (fox like creatures).
